BERRY.Name: Magic Berry
BERRY.Description: A berry filled with unpredictable wild magic.

GRENADE.Name: Wild Magic Grenade
GRENADE.Description: A grenade that releases a random magical effect.

ARROW.Name: Chaotic Magic Arrow
ARROW.Description: An arrow that unleashes a chaotic magical effect upon impact.

MESSAGES.NoTokenFound: No valid token found for the actor.
MESSAGES.AlreadyMaxHP: The character already has maximum health.
MESSAGES.AlreadyHasInspiration: The character already has maximum health and inspiration.

FatalDrain.Name: Fatal Drain
FatalDrain.Description: A sudden energy drain leaves the character with **1 Hit Point** remaining.
FatalDrain.NotificationInfo: You were already at 1 HP or less.
FatalDrain.NoEffect: The energy drain is mild, the character's health remains at {hp}.

RainbowSkin.Name: Rainbow Skin
RainbowSkin.NotificationStart: Your skin turns a brilliant color!

ColorfulHair.Name: Colorful Hair
ColorfulHair.NotificationStart: Your hair changes to an unexpected color.

LongTongue.Name: Long Tongue
LongTongue.NotificationEnd: Your tongue returns to its normal size

OnlyScreams.Name: Only Screams
OnlyScreams.NotificationStart: You can only communicate by screaming!

OnlyWhispers.Name: Only Whispers
OnlyWhispers.NotificationStart: You can only communicate by whispering!

Lightbulb.Name: Lightbulb
Lightbulb.NotificationStart: You become a powerful light bulb!
Lightbulb.NotificationEnd: Your light goes out and you return to normal.

Petrified.Name: Petrified
Petrified.NotificationStart: The character is petrified! They cannot move or act.
Petrified.NotificationEnd: The petrification ends. You return to normal.

Healing.Name: Healing
Healing.Flavor: Magic Healing Result! The character heals {total} HP.

MaxHealing.Name: Maximum Healing
MaxHealing.Flavor: CRITICAL Magic Result! The character heals COMPLETELY. (+{amount} HP)
MaxHealing.Description: The character is completely healed by a flash of magical light. Maximum health restored!
MaxHealing.Notification: Maximum healing! The character has recovered {amount} HP.
MaxHealing.InspirationDescription: An aura of magic surrounds the character, whose vitality is already at maximum. The magical energy channels into **Inspiration**.
MaxHealing.InspirationNotification: Inspiration granted! The character was already at maximum health.
MaxHealing.NoEffectFlavor: CRITICAL Magic Result, but no additional effect.
MaxHealing.NoEffectDescription: An aura of magic surrounds the character, but their vitality is already at maximum and they already have Inspiration.
